remarks: The partial isomorphism C for a lattice ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
dicval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dicval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dicval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dicval.p $e |- P = ( ( oc ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicval.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicval.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicfval $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> I = ( q e. { r e. A | -. r .<_ W } |-> { <. f , s >. | ( f = ( s ` ( iota_ g e. T ( g ` P ) = q ) ) /\ s e. E ) } ) ) $.
$d .<_ q $.
$d A q r $.
$d K f g q r s $.
$d T g $.
$d W f g q r s $.
